content:
────────────────────────────────
**Summary**
• Ethereum ICO whale stakes $646M after a three-year snooze.
• This whale was hoarding ETH from the 2014 ICO, now it’s playing hard.
• Staking this much ETH is a big-ass move, showing confidence in the network.

Impact — A $646M stake is a massive vote of confidence in Ethereum’s future, especially from someone who’s been holding out this long.

────────────────────────────────
Link: https://www.coindesk.com/markets/2025/09/05/ethereum-ico-whale-stakes-usd600m-after-three-years-dormant
